content:
Sure, here are some reliable sources that you can consult to compare the performance of the Orlando Magic team over the years:

1. Official Orlando Magic website: The team's official website contains historical records of the team's past performances, stats, and other relevant information. You can find game schedules, stats, and scores for each season on the website.

2. ESPN: ESPN is one of the most reliable sources for NBA news, scores, and analysis. You can visit their NBA section to access the team's past records, player profiles, and other relevant information. 

3. Basketball-Reference: This website provides comprehensive statistics for every NBA team and player since the league's inception in 1946. You can access the Orlando Magic's performance over the years, including their wins, losses, playoff appearances, and other relevant data.

4. NBC Sports: NBC Sports provides in-depth analysis and news coverage of the NBA, including the Orlando Magic. You can visit their website to read the latest news about the team, player profiles, and scores.

Make sure to cross-reference information from various sources to get a balanced and accurate picture of the team's performance over the years.
